import React from "react"; import { FaLuggageCart } from "react-icons/fa"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import CartIcon from "./cart/CartIcon" import { getToken, clearToken, getCart } from "./utils"; import Cookie from "js-cookie"; /*const NavBar = () => { return {getToken() !== null ? : console.log("NAVBAR UNAUTH")} }*/ class NavBar extends React.Component { constructor() { super() } componentWillMount() { const showNav = Cookie.get('jwt') console.log("ShowNAV", showNav) let authNav = false if (this.showNav != null) { this.authNav = console.log("EINGELOGGT") } else { this.autNav = false } console.log("FIRSTAUTHNAV", authNav) Cookie.get("jwt") !== null ? console.log("Autorisiert") : console.log("RÄUBER DIEBE MÖRDER") } LogOut() { Cookie.remove('jwt') clearToken('jwt') } render() { const AuthNav = () => (

); const UnAuthNav = () => (

) } } export default NavBar;
